name: Custom — Cold Outreach Pro
short: Personalized outreach bot, warm-up + reply detection
description: Custom cold email & LinkedIn outreach sequences, with warm-up, reply detection, and Telegram notifications.

name: Custom — Analytics Reporter
short: Daily KPIs in Slack/Telegram with dashboards

short: Smart support bot for email triage

name: Custom — Build to Order
description: Describe your idea and Maestro builds a custom AI agent or website tailored to your needs. Delivery via Telegram.
